timeline.title: Week 1: Foundation - Mathematics
timeline.description: Start with basic mathematical concepts crucial for GATE CSE.
tasks: Practice problems on Sets and Relations

timeline.title: Week 3: Foundation - Computer Science
tasks: Implement basic data structures in C/C++
Solve coding problems on arrays and linked lists

timeline.title: Week 4: Foundation - Computer Science
tasks: Solve coding problems on sorting and searching

timeline.title: Week 5:  Data Structures and Algorithms
timeline.description: Deep dive into Data Structures and Algorithms
tasks: Implement tree traversals and graph algorithms
Solve medium difficulty problems on LeetCode/GeeksforGeeks

timeline.title: Week 6:  Data Structures and Algorithms
timeline.description: Practice and refine Data Structures and Algorithms skills
tasks: Solve more complex problems on LeetCode/GeeksforGeeks

timeline.title: Week 7: Databases and Operating Systems
timeline.description: Start with the basics of Databases and Operating Systems
tasks: Study SQL basics, Relational Database concepts
Study Process Management, Deadlocks in OS

timeline.title: Week 8: Databases and Operating Systems
timeline.description: Deepen your understanding of Databases and Operating Systems
tasks: Study Memory Management, File Systems in OS

timeline.title: Week 9: Computer Networks and Computer Organization
timeline.description: Begin learning about Computer Networks and Computer Organization
tasks: Solve basic Networking and COA problems

timeline.title: Week 10: Computer Networks and Computer Organization
timeline.description: Strengthen understanding of Computer Networks and Computer Organization
tasks: Study Routing protocols, Network security basics

timeline.title: Week 11:  Theory of Computation and Discrete Mathematics
tasks: Solve problems from previous year papers

timeline.title: Week 12: Revision and Mock Tests
timeline.description: Begin with the revision of all subjects and give mock tests.
tasks: Give at least 2 full-length mock tests
Analyze mistakes and improve weak areas

timeline.title: Week 13-24: Revision and Mock Tests
timeline.description: Continue revising, giving mock tests, and focusing on weak areas.
tasks: Revise all subjects, focusing on weaker areas
Give regular mock tests (at least one per week)
Analyze performance, identify weak areas, and work on them

weekly: Complete a topic from the study plan
Analyze mock test performance and plan improvements

formData.dream: I want to crack GATE CSE exam
